title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 362.2 - Objective
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 362.2 - Objective

State Regulations

To ensure that prompt and decisive action is taken in all
cases through regulating decisionmaking in all violation of conditionally
release supervision cases where reasonable cause exists to believe that a
person who has been conditionally released has lapsed into criminal ways or
company or has violated one or more conditions of conditional
release. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
362.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
